TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataServiceResponse extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents the response to operations sent to the data service as a result of calling <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
The headers from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object containing the name-value pairs of an HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The headers property on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> instance returned will be an empty collection when batching is not used because there is no set of headers that represents the entire save operation.

Docs.summary: The status code from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.
Docs.value: An integer based on status codes defined in [Hypertext Transfer Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520).

remarks.format: ## Remarks For batching operations, this is the status code from the HTTP response associated with the entire batch. For non-batching requests, the value is always 200, which means the caller must inspect each operation to determine its result.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerator that enables retrieval of responses to operations being tracked by objects within the .
Docs.returns: An enumerator over the response received from the service.

Docs.summary: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the response contains multiple results.
Docs.value: A Boolean value that indicates whether the response contains multiple results.
